mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO curriculum_unit_list_class (unit_code, class_code, unit_class_type, unit_class_name, unit_class_text, unit_start_date, unit_end_date, unit_youtube_url, unit_content_url, unit_attached_file, content_code_list, content_use_time, content_home_work, content_test, content_evaluation_type) VALUES
(#{item.unit_code}, #{item.class_code}, #{item.unit_class_type}, #{item.unit_class_name}, #{item.unit_class_text}, #{item.unit_start_date}, #{item.unit_end_date}, #{item.unit_youtube_url}, #{item.unit_content_url}, #{item.unit_attached_file}, #{item.content_code_list}, 0, #{item.content_home_work}, #{item.content_test}, #{item.content_evaluation_type})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM curriculum_unit_list_class WHERE class_code=#{class_code}; UPDATE class_list SET class_unit_list=#{class_unit_list} WHERE teacher_id=#{teacher_id} and class_code=#{class_code};
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM curriculum_unit_list_class WHERE unit_code=#{unit_code} AND class_code=#{class_code}
mapper.update: UPDATE curriculum_unit_list_class SET unit_class_type=#{unit_class_type}, unit_group_name=#{unit_group_name}, unit_group_id_list=#{unit_group_id_list}, unit_class_name=#{unit_class_name}, unit_class_text=#{unit_class_text}, unit_start_date=#{unit_start_date}, unit_end_date=#{unit_end_date}, unit_youtube_url=#{unit_youtube_url}, unit_content_url=#{unit_content_url}, unit_attached_file=#{unit_attached_file}, content_code_list=#{content_code_list}, content_home_work=#{content_home_work}, content_test=#{content_test}, content_evaluation_type=#{content_evaluation_type} WHERE unit_code=#{unit_code} and class_code=#{class_code}
UPDATE curriculum_unit_list_class SET unit_start_date=#{unit_start_date}, unit_end_date=#{unit_end_date} WHERE unit_code=#{unit_code} and class_code=#{class_code}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO curriculum_unit_list_class (unit_code, class_code, unit_class_type, unit_group_name, unit_group_id_list, unit_class_name, unit_class_text, unit_start_date, unit_end_date, unit_youtube_url, unit_content_url, unit_attached_file, content_code_list, content_use_time, content_home_work, content_test, content_evaluation_type) VALUES (#{unit_code}, #{class_code}, #{unit_class_type}, #{unit_group_name}, #{unit_group_id_list}, #{unit_class_name}, #{unit_class_text}, #{unit_start_date}, #{unit_end_date}, #{unit_youtube_url}, #{unit_content_url}, #{unit_attached_file}, #{content_code_list}, 0, #{content_home_work}, #{content_test}, #{content_evaluation_type})

mapper.update: UPDATE content_list SET content_title=#{content_title}, content_name=#{content_name}, content_category=#{content_category}, content_number_list=#{content_number_list}, content_name_list=#{content_name_list}, content_cateogry_list=#{content_cateogry_list}, content_type_list=#{content_type_list}, content_area_list=#{content_area_list}, content_detail_name_list=#{content_detail_name_list}, content_count_list=#{content_count_list}, content_time=#{content_time}, content_url=#{content_url}, content_level_list=#{content_level_list} WHERE content_code=#{content_code} AND content_user=#{teacher_id}
UPDATE student_information SET student_school=#{student_school}, student_level=#{student_level}, student_class=#{student_class}, student_number=#{student_number} WHERE student_id=#{student_id}
UPDATE student_information SET student_state="1" WHERE student_id=#{student_id}
mapper.select: SELECT student_email FROM student_information WHERE student_email=#{student_email}
SELECT student_id FROM student_information WHERE student_id=#{student_id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO student_information (student_id, student_name, student_password, student_email, student_phone, student_push_agreement, student_email_agreement, student_message_agreement, student_age, student_sex, student_school, student_level, student_class, student_number, student_state, news_state, new_messgae_state, student_create_date) VALUES (#{student_id}, #{student_name}, #{student_password}, #{student_email}, #{student_phone}, "1", #{student_email_agreement}, #{student_message_agreement}, #{student_age}, #{student_sex}, #{student_school}, #{student_level}, #{student_class}, #{student_number}, "0", "0", "0", #{student_create_date});
mapper.update: UPDATE class_list SET class_people_max_count=#{class_people_max_count} WHERE teacher_id=#{teacher_id} AND class_code=#{class_code}
mapper.select: SELECT A.student_id, A.student_name, A.student_school, A.student_level, A.student_class, A.student_number FROM student_information A JOIN class_join_list B WHERE A.student_id = B.student_id AND B.class_code = #{class_code}
